hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saying:None of you must wash in standing water when he is in a state of Junub. And Abu Huraira was asked how it was to be done; he said: It was to be taken out in handfuls

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ الاِغْتِسَالِ، فِي الْمَاءِ الرَّاكِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of performing ghusl in standing water
